name: PDF Invoices and Packing Slips For WooCommerce
author: Acowebs

sections.description:
WooCommerce PDF Invoice plugin helps to generate custom designed invoices for a WooCommerce store. Apart from the Invoice, this plugin can also be used to generate Packing Slips, Delivery Notes and Shipping Labels from within WooCommerce orders.

HOW TO MANAGE SETTINGS?

After activating “PDF Invoices and Packing Slips For WooCommerce” plugin go to the PDF Invoice menu under WooCommerce menu in WordPress admin menu bar.

PDF Invoices & Packing Slips FEATURES

ðŸ”¹ Supports Invoice, Packing Slip, Shipping Label, Delivery Note & Dispatch Label
ðŸ”¹ Automatic PDF invoice generation and attachment to order emails.
ðŸ”¹ Customize Options For Store Logo, Name & Address on PDF Invoice, Packing Slip, Delivery Note, Shipping Label & Dispatch Label.
ðŸ”¹ Advanced items table with different tax rates columns and more.
ðŸ”¹ Advanced Customizer For Awesome Invoice Templates.
ðŸ”¹ Logged-in customers can download their invoice from the my-account page.
ðŸ”¹ Option to allow specific roles to access invoice.
ðŸ”¹ Option to disable invoices for free orders.
ðŸ”¹ Option to display or hide free line items in invoice.
ðŸ”¹ Allow Customers to download invoice from the Thank You page
ðŸ”¹ Invoice Number auto generation and customization options(provision to set prefix, suffix as well as padding).
ðŸ”¹ Option to change Invoice name slug
ðŸ”¹ Option to set Order Date as Invoice Date
ðŸ”¹ Support Multiple Google Fonts On Invoice Templates
ðŸ”¹ RTL Support
ðŸ”¹ Support arabic fonts
ðŸ”¹ Custom css option for invoice
ðŸ”¹ Packing slips for order individual items
ðŸ”¹ Compatible with WooCommerce custom order statuses
ðŸ”¹ Invoice Support For Acowebs Deposits & Partial Payments for WooCommerce Payments

DEMO – CHECK THIS OUT IN REAL

ðŸ”— Backend Demo

CHECK OUT OUR VIDEO DEMO ON HOW THIS WORKS:

PRO FEATURES

Woocommerce PDF Invoices & Packing Slips premium version is supercharged with a bunch of cool features and offered at a nominal one-time cost.

ðŸ”¹ All features of the free version.
ðŸ”¹ More than 10 awesome invoice templates to choose from!.
ðŸ”¹ Drag and drop areas in invoice customizer
ðŸ”¹ Drag and drop template customizer for packing slips & shipping labels
ðŸ”¹ More options to customise and personalise the invoice templates.
ðŸ”¹ Compatible with woocommerce sequential order numbers.
ðŸ”¹ Supports different paper sizes for documents and also you can enter custom sizes.
ðŸ”¹ Option to add SSN, VAT fields at checkout and it can show in the invoice document.
ðŸ”¹ More customization options for packing slips, shipping label and other documents.
ðŸ”¹ Credit note generation for order refunds.
ðŸ”¹ Meta field to add order tracking number(if you have) on the order detail page, which will be displayed on shipping label document.
ðŸ”¹ Option to attach other pdf files like privacy policy, return policy etc with invoice mails.
ðŸ”¹ Compatible with woocommerce subscription plugin renewal orders in woocommerce order page.
ðŸ”¹ Provision to add paid stamp on invoice documents.
ðŸ”¹ Provision to add signature on invoice documents.
ðŸ”¹ Option to print invoices between specific date ranges
ðŸ”¹ Provision to show vat number from major tax related plugins(WooCommerce EU VAT Assistant, EU VAT Number etc)
ðŸ”¹ Proforma supported for orders
ðŸ”¹ Custom css option for documents
ðŸ”¹ Chinese language support

sections.installation:
Installation of “PDF Invoices and Packing Slips For WooCommerce” can be done either by searching for “PDF Invoices and Packing Slips For WooCommerce” via the “Plugins > Add New” screen in your WordPress dashboard, or by using the following steps:

  1. Download the plugin via WordPress.org
  2. Upload the ZIP file through the ‘Plugins > Add New > Upload’ screen in your WordPress dashboard
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Can admin customize pdf invoices generates?

Yes, admin can changes invoice template color theme, font family and labels. More templates and customization options will be availible in premium version.

Can this plugin generate shipping labels?

Yes. apart from this you can also generates packing slips, delivery notes & dispatch labels.

Can customers download invoice?

Yes, customer can download invoice from order detail page from my-account section. And also view option availible in both the order list table and detail page respectively.

How the invoice number will be generated?

It will be auto incremented according to new order. There are reset option also exisist for invoice number.
